scripts.distribute: mkdir -p ../vdp16-dist/lib && mv vdp16-contained* ../vdp16-dist && cp main.js ../vdp16-dist/ && cp index.html ../vdp16-dist/ && cp -r dist ../vdp16-dist/ && cp -r src ../vdp16-dist && cp lib/vdp-lib.js ../vdp16-dist/lib/ && cp lib/vdp-lib.d.ts ../vdp16-dist/lib/
scripts.editor-build-exe-win32: npm run editor-build-exe-resources && pkg -t node8-win-x86 . && npm run distribute
scripts.editor-build-exe-mac: npm run editor-build-exe-resources && pkg -t node8-macos-x64 . && npm run distribute
scripts.editor-build-exe-linux: npm run editor-build-exe-resources && pkg -t node8-linux-x86 . && npm run distribute
